E

edge_ngram(String) - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider
The edge_ngram method returns a list of all of the Edge N-grams of a word.
emptyList - Variable in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
 
expectedResult - Variable in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
 

G

getChildren() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.Candidate
Really the only complex method in Candidate, "getChildren" recursively retrieves all of the children of a given Candidate into the new list "allkids", which it returns.
getConfidence() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.Candidate
 
getWord() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.Candidate
 
getWords(String) - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider
The getWords method fulfills the goal of getting all full words that have "fragment" as an Edge N-gram.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard
The "main" method demonstrates some ways of getting test data into the AutocompleteProvider.train method and then testing various fragments through the AutocompleteProvider.getWords method.
main(String[]) - Static method in class TestRunner
TestRunner.main directs the JUnitCore unit testing module to run the tests from MobileDeviceKeyboardTest.
MobileDeviceKeyboard - Class in <Unnamed>
MobileDeviceKeyboard is a class that contains the AutocompleteProvider class and the Candidate class, which together provide autocompletion of word fragments.
MobileDeviceKeyboard() - Constructor for class MobileDeviceKeyboard
 
MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider - Class in <Unnamed>
The Autocomplete Provider provides autocompletion candidate words based on words individually read from one or more passages via the"train" method.
MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider.sortByConfidenceAndWord - Class in <Unnamed>
 
MobileDeviceKeyboard.Candidate - Class in <Unnamed>
The Candidate class provides for Objects that store a candidate word or fragment of a whole word with a certain confidence level and a list of children that are potential completions for a fragment.
MobileDeviceKeyboardTest - Class in <Unnamed>
MobileDeviceKeyboardTest provides sample tests for the Candidate and AutocompleteProvider classes of MobileDeviceKeyboard.
MobileDeviceKeyboardTest() - Constructor for class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
 

S

setConfidence(int) - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.Candidate
 
singleLetter - Variable in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
 
sortByConfidenceAndWord() - Constructor for class MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider.sortByConfidenceAndWord
 

T

testCandidateAddGetChild() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testCandidateAddGetChild adds a child and a grandchild and then demonstrates retrieving them with getChildren.
testCandidateGetConfidence() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testCandidateGetConfidence sets and then retrieves a value of 1 for the Confidence value.
testCandidateGetWord() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
An instance of the Candidate class has the word "Test".
testEdgeNgramEmptyString() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testEdgeNgram tests that edge_ngram returns an empty list if an empty string is passed in.
testEdgeNgramGoodString() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testEdgeNgramGoodString demonstrates that all Edge N-Grams of the word "There" are returned by a call to edge_ngram.
testEdgeNgramNullString() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testEdgeNgramNullString tests that edge_ngram returns an empty list if a null is passed in for "word".
testEdgeNgramSingleLetterWord() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testEdgeNgramSingleLetterWord tests that the full word "a" is returned in a single-word list from a call to edge_ngram.
TestRunner - Class in <Unnamed>
TestRunner runs all tests defined in MobileDeviceKeyboardTest.
TestRunner() - Constructor for class TestRunner
 
testTrainAndGetWord() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testTrainAndGetWord tests storing a word via a "train" call and then retrieving the word via the getWords call.
testTrainAndGetWords() - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboardTest
testTrainAndGetWords tests by calling "train" with a short passage, then getWords with the fragment "th".
train(String) - Method in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider
The train method accepts a string as "passage", parses words individually from the passage, and adds each word and its Edge N-grams to the word_indices HashMap.

W

word - Variable in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.Candidate
 
word_indices - Variable in class MobileDeviceKeyboard.AutocompleteProvider
The "word_indices" HashMap is the master list of all Edge N-grams, including full words, stored as Candidate objects.
